data.text: N yi Alatalaa hinan ɲɛɛna fe rali
E mɔn singe ra fonne taa xɔnne tima nɛn,
Xɔɲɛne findima nɛn ɛ xuruse rabane ra,
Koni a falama ɛ tan ma nɛn,
Bayo, kiti kɛndɛn nafan n tan Alatala ma,
Ɛ bɔnsɔnna kolonma nɛn siyane tagi,
Marigina Alatala tinxinyaan nun tantunna raminima nɛn siyane birin yɛtagi
